title: Come reportare sto tipo ? Entrate in tanti
body:
ragazzi 5 minuti fa ho parlato con questo tizio che probabilmente ha cercato di fottermi l'account, proponendomi di ricevere un codice di rp.
Ovviamente nella chat" è stato bloccato" e quindi mi ha chiesto i dati di log in cosi me lo avrebbe fatto lui, sempre ovviamente era una cazzata ergo all'inizio ho fatto finta di niente.
Ora non so quante persone ci sono cascate ma si potrebbe fare qualcosa per questi giocatori? Si possono reportare in qualche modo? Seriamente penso che sti scemi debbano perire {{champion:83}}  {{champion:83}}  {{champion:83}}  {{item:3071}} 
Ecco a voi la chat dite cosa ne pensate



01/12/2015
[4:08PM] Lasergame Lucian: hey 
i got some rp codes left 
do u want them 
[4:08PM] DeathShot97: yah
yeah
[4:08PM] Lasergame Lucian: they will expire in like 20 min so we have to be quick 
ok wait let me paste the code 
***********
oh lol 
its protected
[4:09PM] DeathShot97: yeah ahah
[4:09PM] Lasergame Lucian: uhm 
i gotta login in ur account 
if u want the rp 
[4:09PM] DeathShot97: oh okey
if you want i can give you my passw and login
[4:10PM] Lasergame Lucian: sounds good 
[4:10PM] DeathShot97: :D
how many rp i get trough this way?
[4:11PM] Lasergame Lucian: i guess 5800
[4:11PM] DeathShot97: wow
[4:11PM] Lasergame Lucian: i dont know for sure
[4:11PM] DeathShot97: ThANK You!!!!!!!!!
wait
[4:11PM] Lasergame Lucian: hury tho 
[4:11PM] DeathShot97: login is deathshot97
[4:11PM] Lasergame Lucian: it will expire in a bit 
ok 
and the password?
[4:12PM] DeathShot97: and the password is FuckYoUManImGonnaReport You
[4:12PM] Lasergame Lucian: LOL
[4:12PM] DeathShot97: you think im stupid?
[4:12PM] Lasergame Lucian: hahahaaha
[4:12PM] DeathShot97: ahah
[4:12PM] Lasergame Lucian: okay then 
was legit gonna give you it 
but ok
[4:13PM] DeathShot97: why you're doing this?
[4:13PM] Lasergame Lucian: im at the max cap of rp right now 
[4:13PM] DeathShot97: ahahahahah
[4:13PM] Lasergame Lucian: so i have nothing to do with the codes 
[4:13PM] DeathShot97: so srupid
[4:13PM] Lasergame Lucian: thought i could give em away
[4:13PM] DeathShot97: stupid*
[4:14PM] Lasergame Lucian: ok im stupid xd 
[4:14PM] DeathShot97: what an incredible act of mercy
[4:14PM] Lasergame Lucian: well ty 
i guess
[4:14PM] DeathShot97: everyone should take example from you
[4:15PM] Lasergame Lucian: why are we even argueing over this lol 
[4:16PM] DeathShot97: i dont know
why you wanted to steal my account?
[4:16PM] Lasergame Lucian: i didnt 
but since that code was expireing i thought give it away 
why would i wanna have ur acc anyway 
[4:17PM] DeathShot97: let me thin
think
you can sell it
[4:18PM] Lasergame Lucian: ur acc isnt even that much worth i guess 
[4:18PM] DeathShot97: yeah i know
listen
[4:18PM] Lasergame Lucian: got 2 spare accounts myself 
why would i do that 
ye?
[4:19PM] DeathShot97: i dont have time to spend with you
[4:19PM] Lasergame Lucian: so why are we argueing then?
[4:19PM] DeathShot97: the only thing im gonna do is report you
aw ok fine.
cya
[4:19PM] Lasergame Lucian: yea great report me 
xd 
cya

replies.body: mah ... veramente certe persone non le capisco proprio
